author: Yong Pung How CJ (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Law Society of Singapore v Yap Shao Sin Philip
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Tay Yong Kwang J; Yong Pung How CJ

tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Show cause action/Advocate and solicitor convicted of criminal breach of trust/Weight to be given to mitigating factors/Appropriate order to be made/Section 83(1) Legal Profession Act (Cap 161, 2001 Rev Ed), s 409 Penal Code (Cap 224, 1985 Rev Ed)
